nodes.text: Around 1 BBY, a male Weequay gladiator fought in the Tarko-se Arena on the planet Cato Neimoidia. He and Frank charged at the Jedi General Rahm Kota, who had been imprisoned in the arena by Tarko-se's ruler, Baron Merillion Tarko. The two gladiators were struck down and killed by Kota's lightsaber. This gladiator carried a large mace at the time of his death.

This gladiator appears in the opening cinematic of 2010's Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II for the Nintendo Wii. That version differs from the Xbox 360/PlayStation 3 versions, which more closely follow the "official" version of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II in the novel. Only Frank appears in the other version, leaving this Weequay's existence murky.
